mapper.insert: insert into `backend_user` (userCode, userName, userType, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, userPassword) values (#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update `backend_user` set userCode = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{userType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userPassword = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, userCode, userName, userType, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, userPassword from `backend_user` where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, userCode, userName, userType, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, userPassword from `backend_user`
